verses.verse: Now in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> in order to <S%H3615>fulfill<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5782>stirred<s%> up the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> so that he <S%H5674>sent<s%> a <S%H6963>proclamation<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> [put it] in <S%H4385>writing,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and He has <S%H6485>appointed<s%> me to <S%H1129>build<s%> Him a <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

<S%H4310>'Whoever<s%> there is among you of <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%> may his <S%H430>God<s%> be with him! Let him <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> He is the <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

'And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7604>survivor,<s%> at <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> he may <S%H1481>live,<s%> let the <S%H376>men<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5375>support<s%> him with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with <S%H7399>goods<s%> and <S%H929>cattle,<s%> <S%H5973>together<s%> with a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offering<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>' "

Then the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households] of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> even <S%H3605>everyone<s%> whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5782>stirred<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> those <S%H5439>about<s%> them <S%H2388>encouraged<s%> <S%H3027><s%> them with <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with <S%H7399>goods,<s%> with <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and with <S%H4030>valuables,<s%> <S%H905>aside<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> that was <S%H5068>given<s%> as a <S%H5068>freewill<s%> <S%H5068>offering.<s%>

Also <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> out the <S%H3627>articles<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had <S%H3318>carried<s%> <S%H3318>away<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>gods;<s%>

and <S%H3566>Cyrus,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> had them <S%H3318>brought<s%> out by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4990>Mithredath<s%> the <S%H1489>treasurer,<s%> and he <S%H5608>counted<s%> them out to <S%H8339>Sheshbazzar,<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> [numbered] 5400. <S%H8339>Sheshbazzar<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> up with the <S%H1473>exiles<s%> who <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
